events.name: TST Sober Faction's Second Annual Sober Mass
events.description: The Satanic Temple Sober Faction will be performing their second Sober Mass honoring all those battling addiction who have been lost due to stigma, pseudoscience, & superstition in recovery.

events.name: Tom The Witch's Neighborhood: Hate
events.description: Join Salem historian, Witch, and Satanic Minister Thomas O'Brien Vallor for some educational programming. Special guests, field trips, and more! This episode is all about HATE. Brought to you by the number 420!

events.name: Hexennacht Benediction by Minister Zither
events.description: Benedictions explore the spirit of their respective holidays. Benedictions for Satanic holiday events focus people's attention on the religious importance of the holiday. They are a performance as much as they are a declaration, creating a feeling of religious connection and meaning.

events.name: WOLFDREAM: An Art Show by Salem Art Gallery
events.description: Walk through our gallery and experience the marvelous art. Purchases support Wolf Hollow, a wolf rescue in Salem

events.name: Whimsical Blasphemy with DJ Mercy Maelica
events.description: Join Mercy, our veteran performer and Resident DJ for music and videos live from Salem.
